creditsText: If You Can Make That You Can Make This
sourceName: If You Can Make That You Can Make This
title: Shrimp Roll
summary: Shrimp Roll might be just the hor d'oeuvre you are searching for. For 7 cents per serving, this recipe covers 1% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One serving contains 18 calories, 0g of protein, and 2g of fat. This recipe serves 6. A mixture of celery stick, chives, long shrimp, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so tasty. 15 people were glad they tried this recipe. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, dairy free, whole 30, and pescatarian diet. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 10 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 8%, this dish is very bad (but still fixable). Try Shrimp Roll, Wasabi Shrimp Roll, and Spicy Shrimp Roll for similar recipes.

winePairing.pairingText: Pinot Grigio, Riesling, and Sauvignon Blanc are great choices for Shrimp. These crisp white wines work well with shrimp prepared in a variety of ways, whether grilled, fried, or in garlic sauce. The Ziobaffan Organic Pinot Grigio with a 4.6 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 17 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Ziobaffa Organic Pinot Grigio
productMatches.description: Ziobaffa Organic Pinot Grigio has fresh rich aromas of apples and pears with hints of citrus that fade into a floral bouquet and on the palate it is bright and fresh with wonderful fruit flavors.ZIOBAFFA Pinot Grigio pairs well with a wide array of lighter cuisine, especially fish/shellfish, poultry, pastas in cream sauce and softer cheeses. It's also an ideal aperitif. Blend: 100% Pinot Grigio
